author: danielsh
msg: (APXS): Strip whitespace at the end of the definition, which propagates to
(APXS): Fix the sniffing from Makefile so that it works not only when
grep/sed failed, but also when they succeeded (by promoting the setting
of the parameter outside of a subshell).

author: danielsh
msg: davautocheck.sh: use the APXS value from Makefile.  Without this patch,
/usr/bin/apxs2 would be used even if --with-apxs=... was passed to configure.
(APXS): Sniff the value from Makefile.  Since this depends on $ABS_BUILDDIR,
move the code that sets that variable up (without changing it).
